mapper.select: SELECT SUM(p.pay_per_price) + SUM(p.pay_po_price) AS 'total_sales', SUM(p.pay_po_price) AS 'pre_order_sales' FROM payment p JOIN reservation r ON p.res_idx = r.res_idx JOIN company c ON r.com_id = c.com_id WHERE c.com_id = #{com_id} AND r.res_pay_status != 2 AND r.res_pay_status != 0 AND p.pay_status = 1 AND DATE(p.pay_date) = #{company_date}

SELECT c.com_name, COUNT(r.res_idx) AS 'total_res_count', SUM(r.res_person) AS 'total_res_people' FROM company c JOIN reservation r ON c.com_id = r.com_id WHERE c.com_id = #{com_id} AND r.res_status != 2 AND DATE(r.res_now) = #{company_date} GROUP BY c.com_id;

SELECT m.menu_name AS 'menu_name', m.menu_price AS 'menu_price', ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(po.pre_num), 0) FROM pre_order po LEFT JOIN payment p ON po.res_idx = p.res_idx WHERE po.menu_idx = m.menu_idx AND DATE(p.pay_date) = #{company_date} ) AS 'pre_sales', ( SELECT COALESCE(SUM(m.menu_price * po.pre_num), 0) FROM pre_order po LEFT JOIN payment p ON po.res_idx = p.res_idx WHERE po.menu_idx = m.menu_idx AND DATE(p.pay_date) = #{company_date} ) AS 'total_menu_sales' FROM menu m JOIN company c ON m.com_id = c.com_id WHERE c.com_id = #{com_id}
mapper.insert: insert into menu (menu_idx, com_id, menu_name, menu_price, menu_describe, menu_img) values (null,#{com_id} ,#{menu.menu_name}, #{menu.menu_price}, #{menu.menu_describe}, #{menu.menu_img})
